name: Army Clicker (JasonCSharp)
description:
This game was for my first ever game jam, so I kept it small. This is a small infinite clicker style game but with an end, you can destroy your target. Your end goal will be to have the largest army in one game.

A machine has landed and must be destroyed, if it opens the world will be destroyed. Your goal is to destroy it, click to to deal direct damage, spend money on upgrades and more men, your men are stronger together so you want your total power (1 power per man) to be as high as possible.
